vocabularydefinition.name: Time: End of Day
vocabularydefinition.description: End of day.

formatstring.string: the end of the day

vocabularydefinition.name: Define a BAM activity step
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a step for a given BAM activity.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Define a step called {2} for BAM activity {1}.

vocabularydefinition.name: Extend a BAM activity step
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a step extension for an activity containing a BAM step.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Define an extension called {1} for the BAM step in this directive.

vocabularydefinition.name: Extend a post-transformation BAM activity step
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a step extension for an activity containing a post-transformation BAM step.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Define an extension called {1} for the post-transformation BAM step in this directive.

vocabularydefinition.name: Perform retries at a given level
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a retry policy on a directive for a given level.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] On failure, perform {1} level {3} retries at {2} minute intervals

vocabularydefinition.name: Time: hh:mm:ss
vocabularydefinition.description: A time.

formatstring.string: time {0}

vocabularydefinition.name: Time: Start of Day
vocabularydefinition.description: Start of day.

formatstring.string: the start of the day

vocabularydefinition.name: Send to an endpoint with a specified transport and configuration
vocabularydefinition.description: Set endpoint attributes on a directive. Specify a transport and configuration.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Send the message to {1} using transport type {2} and the following configuration:{3}

vocabularydefinition.name: Assign a value to a BTS GlobalSchema property
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a value on a directive for a BizTalk Server GlobalSchema property. The property may optionally be promoted.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Assign the value {2} to the {1} BizTalk Server global property. Mark as promoted? {3}

vocabularydefinition.name: Send to an endpoint
vocabularydefinition.description: Set endpoint attributes on a directive.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Send the message to {1}

vocabularydefinition.name: Assign a value to a promoted BTS GlobalSchema property
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a value on a directive for a BizTalk Server GlobalSchema property, and mark as promoted.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Assign the value {2} to the {1} BizTalk Server global property and mark as promoted

vocabularydefinition.name: Perform retries
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a retry policy on a directive (level 0).

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] On failure, perform {1} retries at {2} minute intervals

vocabularydefinition.name: Define a post-transformation BAM activity step
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a step for a given BAM activity. The step will be located after a transformation. The step will only be implemented if the directive defines a transformation.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Define a post-transformation step called {2} for BAM activity {1}.

vocabularydefinition.name: Set the SOAP Action header
vocabularydefinition.description: Set the SOAPAction header on a SOAP interchange.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Set the SOAP Action header to {1}

vocabularydefinition.name: Assign a value to a promoted BTS Property
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a value on a directive for a BizTalk Server property, and mark as promoted.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Assign the value {2} to the {1} BizTalk Server property in the {3} namespace and mark as promoted

vocabularydefinition.name: Define a service window
vocabularydefinition.description: Sets a service window for a directive.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Define a service window that opens at {1} and closes at {2}

vocabularydefinition.name: Configure a BAM interceptor
vocabularydefinition.description: Set configuration properties for the BAM interceptor.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Configure the BAM interceptor to use the following connection string: {1}. Use a buffered event stream? {2}. Set the flush threshold to {3}

vocabularydefinition.name: Assign a value to a BTS property
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a value on a directive for a BizTalk Server property. The property may optionally be promoted.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Assign the value {2} to the {1} BizTalk Server property in the {3} namespace. Mark as promoted? {4}

vocabularydefinition.name: Assign a value to a property
vocabularydefinition.description: Set a value on a directive for a general purpose property.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Assign the value {2} to the {1} property

vocabularydefinition.name: Apply a transformation
vocabularydefinition.description: Set transformation attributes on a directive.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Apply a transformation using the following BizTalk Server map: {1}

vocabularydefinition.name: Apply formatting to XML content
vocabularydefinition.description: Set formatting attributes for XML content on a directive.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Apply the following formatting to XML content: {1}

vocabularydefinition.name: Send to an endpoint with a specified transport
vocabularydefinition.description: Set endpoint attributes on a directive. Specify a transport.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Send the message to {1} using transport type {2}

vocabularydefinition.name: Specify a BAM trackpoint policy
vocabularydefinition.description: Specifies a trackpoint policy to be used for a BAM step.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Use policy {1} for BAM trackpoint configuration

vocabularydefinition.name: Specify a BAM trackpoint policy and version
vocabularydefinition.description: Specifies a trackpoint policy and version to be used for a BAM step.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Use version {2} of {1} policy for BAM trackpoint configuration

vocabularydefinition.name: Specify a validation policy and version
vocabularydefinition.description: Specifies a validation policy and version to be used to validate data or messages.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Use version {2} of {1} policy for data or message validation

vocabularydefinition.name: Specify a validation policy and version with exceptions
vocabularydefinition.description: Specifies a validation policy and version to be used to validate data or messages and throw an exception for any logged errors.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Use version {2} of {1} policy for data or message validation. Throw an exception for any logged errors? {3}

vocabularydefinition.name: Specify a validation policy
vocabularydefinition.description: Specifies a validation policy to be used to validate data or messages.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Use policy {1} for data or message validation

vocabularydefinition.name: Specify a validation policy with exceptions
vocabularydefinition.description: Specifies a validation policy to be used to validate data or messages and throw an exception for any logged errors.

formatstring.string: [ Directive {0} ] Use policy {1} for data or message validation. Throw an exception for any logged errors? {2}
